content.text: JavaScript can display data in different ways. Here are the four most common methods.

content.text: document.write() is useful for testing only. If used after the page loads it will delete all existing HTML.

content.title: document.write() Danger
code: // Only safe to use during page loading (testing)

content.text: Never use document.write() in a live production site — it overwrites the entire page content when called after load.
